tweet: As the month of June comes to an end, I am joining @TheBlackCaucus to recognize #gunviolence awareness month in the black community. 100 Americans die each & every day from guns, & Black Americans are disproportionately affected. We must #EndGunViolence! #BlackLivesMatter https://twitter.com/TheBlackCaucus/status/1144637379338264576 …
Did you know 1 in 7 people living with #HIV don’t know it? Today is National #HIVTestingDay, #KnowYourStatus by finding a place to get tested at  http://www.cdc.gov/doingit ! #NHTD

.@RepDavid and I released the following joint statement condemning the horrific suicide bombing attacks which took place this morning in Tunis, Tunisia:  https://alceehastings.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=401200 … pic.twitter.com/hEF585EMpQ

June 26th has seen #SCOTUS hand down 3 landmark victories for LGBTQ Americans in the past 20 years – ensuring marriage equality, decriminalizing same-sex couples & overturning DOMA. Let’s take #PrideInProgress we’ve made towards LGBTQ equality & make today #LGBTQEqualityDay! pic.twitter.com/BvUAQdddTP

I was pleased to join @RepDelBene in co-sponsoring a resolution commemorating June 26th as #LGBTQEqualityDay. Today, we honor how far we’ve come & pledge to continue to fight to accomplish full #LGBTQ equality! #PrideinProgress pic.twitter.com/SnAmE25enO

I’m pleased to recognize Mr. Eduardo Pantoja for winning the 2019 Annual Congressional Art Competition for Florida’s 20th Congressional District. Eduardo’s photography entry is titled “Dripping Thoughts” & will be displayed in the US Capitol throughout the year. Congrats Eduardo! pic.twitter.com/yGZ6PECCCY

We’re in a @ClimateCrisis. We can see the evidence of global warming everywhere, including in Florida. These are “warming stripes” that show how much hotter Florida has gotten over time. It is time for #ClimateActionNow! #ShowYourStripes pic.twitter.com/UYE9MQogsC

Today is #NationalAskDay. Did you know that 1 out of 3 homes with kids has a gun? Today, make sure you ask if there’s a gun where your child plays or visits! #ASKingSavesKids pic.twitter.com/SOouUi8Nfv

The #YulinDogMeatFestival begins today–meaning thousands of dogs & cats will be tortured prior to their slaughter & consumption including being burnt, skinned, or boiled alive, having their paws cleaved off while conscious, & being staked to the ground & beaten to death #EndYulin pic.twitter.com/Jo3w40XZw1

The UN Refugee Agency estimates that half the world’s refugees are children– a somber reminder of how much work there still is to do. I'm proud to join my colleagues in recognizing #WorldRefugeeDay by cosponsoring HRes444, legislation reaffirming US commitment to protect refugees pic.twitter.com/crLb945OYX

Today is #Juneteenth, which marks the day the last slaves in the US were freed in 1865. Let us draw strength from past generations who inspired us to dream. We celebrate not only our freedom and achievements, but also recommit ourselves to the struggle for #EqualRights for all!

Today, I joined @RepRashida as a cosponsor of the #BOOSTAct. Working class families shouldn't have to struggle every day just to get by. This bill would lift over 3 million children & 9 million families out of poverty - cutting poverty by 45% & helping our communities thrive!

Today I'm proud to lead a letter along w/ 34 other Reps urging @SecPompeo to use the momentum from recently passed US legislation & movements worldwide to urge all countries, including China, South Korea & Vietnam to end the horrific dog & cat meat trade once & for all! #EndYulin pic.twitter.com/xI6XPFm58D
This is now the longest period our nation’s history without an increase to the federal minimum wage. This is unacceptable. It’s time to #RaiseTheWage! pic.twitter.com/fUvN5WdhFp
No one working full-time in America should be living in poverty. I am proud to support the #RaisetheWage Act, which will give nearly 40 million workers a raise. pic.twitter.com/IbBMJ8BRrR
Happy #FathersDay! Today and every day, we honor the sacrifices of our nation’s father’s and are inspired by their knowledge, strength and love. pic.twitter.com/VqgoZZ1IP5

Happy #FlagDay, an annual holiday celebrating the adoption of our nation’s flag in 1977. I’m honored to represent #FL20 and to take a moment today to reflect on the history, diversity, bravery, and democratic values our flag symbolizes. https://twitter.com/librarycongress/status/1139503303451205633 …
Joining me in introducing the Services for Ending Long-Term Homelessness Act are @RepCohen @RepJimmyGomez @JacksonLeeTX18 @RepBarbaraLee @EleanorNorton. pic.twitter.com/HcPr2qOA3z

I’m proud to introduce the Services for Ending Long-Term Homelessness Act, which would comprehensively address the chronic homelessness faced by nearly 100,000 Americans. Allowing men, women & children to live on the streets is not a standard America should be willing to accept!

.@SenDuckworth & I introduced H.R.3166 to ensure that DoD forms are free from racially or ethnically insensitive terminology. My colleague @RepAnthonyBrown added our bill to the FY2020 NDAA today as an amendment. Thanks to @HASCDemocrats and @hascrepublicans for your support!

3 years ago, 49 people were killed in the horrific Pulse Nightclub mass shooting targeting the #LGBTQ+ community. There's no place for #gunviolence, bigotry & hate in our communities! As we honor those who were killed, I pledge to always fight for love & acceptance. #WeAreOrlando pic.twitter.com/cVvHsvALhA

Today, @SenDuckworth & I introduced legislation to ensure that DoD forms are free from racially or ethnically insensitive terminology. This is an important initiative that is in the best interest of our service members & our country. My thx to the 42 House & 4 Senate cosponsors. pic.twitter.com/mb52WBjzxE

Today is Caribbean American #HIV/AIDS Awareness Day.  There are over 4 million Caribbean Americans who are a valuable part of our communities in FL & across the US. To end #HealthDisparities among Caribbean Americans, we must improve access to education & affordable healthcare.

Addressing mental health disparities in Black communities is an absolute necessity that @OfficialCBC’s Taskforce on Black Youth Suicide & Mental Health is committed to supporting. Thank you @TheRealTaraji for sharing your perspective today on the importance of #BlackMentalHealth! https://twitter.com/TherealTaraji/status/1137039730472882176 …

Each day, nearly 100 people in our nation are killed by someone using a gun. 

Each year, more than 36,000 are killed by someone using a gun. 

#EnoughIsEnough. We must honor them with action and continue our fight to #EndGunViolence. #WearOrange #GunViolenceAwarenessDay pic.twitter.com/fa2i6r33Ca

Enough is enough. Families across Florida live every day with the pain & loss caused by gun violence. The House has taken action to save lives. It is time for the Senate to do the same by passing #HR8 and #HR1112! #WearOrange #EndGunViolence #GunViolenceAwarenessDay pic.twitter.com/nFScsc5zDM

It’s common sense. If you can’t pass a background check, you shouldn’t be able to buy a firearm. It’s been 100 days since @HouseDemocrats passed #HR8. I urge my colleagues in the Senate to take action & make our communities safer by passing this bill! #GunViolenceAwarenessMonth

As we mark the 75th Anniversary of D-Day, we remember all those who stormed the beaches of Normandy. Today, let us pause to express gratitude to the thousands that bore the battle on that “Longest Day” and honor their brave legacy. #DDay75 pic.twitter.com/yUwOs3usWp

.@HouseDemocrats passed the #EqualityAct for a reason.  The #LGBTQ community faces discrimination in far too many aspects of life and it’s unacceptable.  For #PrideMonth, I hope my colleagues in the Senate do the right thing by supporting this important bill. pic.twitter.com/yBrQetsrm7

Thousands of jobs & livelihoods are supported in Florida by the tourism, fishing, & coastal economy. In FL alone, coral reefs support 70,000 jobs & create $6 billion every year in local sales. These may be at risk from ocean acidification. #ProtectOurOceans #CapitolHillOceanWeek pic.twitter.com/wMdnRLlVww

During Caribbean American Heritage Month, let's recognize the valuable contributions made by Caribbean Americans to strengthen our nation. Florida is home to a large Caribbean American community & I'm proud to represent a district with such a rich & diverse cultural identity pic.twitter.com/rn2XxsYUJj

I was deeply saddened to learn of the horrific shooting in Virginia Beach. My heart goes out to the families affected by this tragedy. I stand with the Virginia Beach community during this time of mourning.

Hurricane season begins today & runs through November 30. It is critical that all Floridians adequately prepare ahead of time should a hurricane make landfall. My office has once again prepared a list of resources that can be found at the following link -  https://bit.ly/2HKP3iT  pic.twitter.com/Prgt7OpPI5
